title: Bachelor, Information Systems
description: Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Information Systems with a focus on developing skills in programming, system management, security, and technological infrastructure:
content: Programming Logic: Creation of algorithms to solve system-related problems
Databases: Modeling, management, and data manipulation in relational and non-relational systems using SQL and modern tools
IT Governance: Study of policies and best practices for aligning IT strategies with business objectives
DevOps Tools: Implementation of continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) practices with tools like Golang and Docker, log capture with Graylog, and analysis using Grafana
Software Testing: Quality validation through manual and automated testing
Back-End and Front-End Frameworks: Development of APIs and interfaces using Spring Boot, Vue.js, and others
Information Security: Application of principles to protect data, systems, and networks from cyber threats
